name: Dark Cloud (itch)
description:
Overview

This game set in the arid city of Zenobia, which never rains but has the architectural style of a rainforest. The main character of the game grows up in Zenobia, and she yearn for the rain forest area mentioned by her elders, so she decides to make Zenobia rain and wants to look for the dark cloud. She knows from her good friend, a lava slime, that it takes five colored clouds to make the dark cloud......

Controls

WASD: Control the direction (walk)

WASD+Shift: Run

Left Mouse Button: Take photos (Attack)

Right Mouse Button: Defense

Space Bar: Jump

Q: Rolling

C: Crouch

Menu Controls

P: Start the game

R: Pause and Resume

Left Ctrl: Open controls page

B: Back to last page

M: Back to Menu

T: Restart the game

ESC: Quit Game

Extra Submission Info

Student name: Jiaji Lu (Lab 2)

Something You Should Know
